page.title: 17A Bentley traveller's life
page.content: I live at{Tilts Farm, Tilts Lane, {Bentley.}Being a traveller is very different to living like you people. When you go to bed you don't have to pull the seats out to make your bed because yours is all ready made for you. It is also different when we move around.You people can't move around because you live in a house and I live in a caravan which has wheels.It is also very different with money because a thousand pounds is not very dear to us. In the old days travellers used to live in a wagon and they used to move by tying a horse onto the wagon like on the first photograph.We also used to stop in the fields.We also say different words to you,like you say {"good"}we say{"cushty".
